```{r,echo=F}
ab = sample(2:9,2)
a = ab[1]*0.1
b = ab[2]*0.1

```




Question
========

Evaluate the product.

$$`r a` \cdot `r b`$$



Solution
========

First, recognize that $`r a`=`r a*10`\cdot 0.1$ and that $`r b`=`r b*10`\cdot 0.1$.

You can rewrite the product...
$$(`r a*10` \cdot `r b*10`) \cdot (0.1 \cdot 0.1)$$

$$`r a*b*100`  \cdot 0.01$$

Multiplying by 0.01 moves the decimal point 2 digits to the left.


$$`r a*b`$$
